title: Just Curious
body:
So.. I got a warning for leaving a game (Had a blackout couldn't do anything).
What does this mean...
Does it mean that if i leave 1 more game i will get low priority, because i don't wana play a game if i continuing internet problems just in case
Answers pls

replies.body:
was it that thing where you have to type "I agree"
if so, don't worry. you get that the first time you leave a game since it was implemented.

O Yeah it was- Either way gonna wait till my internet fixes!
Thanks Bro
